mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productDis (pdDisCode, pdDisNum, pdDisDate, pdDisReason, pdDisAmt, pdNum) VALUES (productDis_seq.NEXTVAL, #{pdDisNum}, sysdate, #{pdDisReason}, #{pdDisAmt}, #{pdNum})
mapper.select: SELECT d.pdNum, d.pdDisCode, d.pdDisNum, d.pdDisDate, d.pdDisReason, d.pdDisAmt, l.pdName, l.pdStCount, i.pdRawPrice FROM productDis d LEFT OUTER JOIN productList l ON d.pdNum=l.pdNum LEFT OUTER JOIN productIn i ON l.pdNum=i.pdNum WHERE pdName=#{pdName}
